cleaned_text: Promotes Whole-Body Balance* We carefully formulated this product for women, to support a healthy hormone balance.* - Supports Mood* Myo-inositol and DIM restore balance and help with mild mood changes during PMS.* - Promotes Radiant Skin* Promote balance from within!
